section_title: THIRD ASSESSMENT REPORT (TAR) OF THE IPCC
sentences: On 24 October, the EU, opposed by the US and the G-77/China, proposed an agenda item on the methodological issues relating to the stabilization of greenhouse gas emissions.
Chair Thorgeirsson said he would prepare conclusions.
On 29 October, Parties adopted the conclusions with minor amendments.
enb_long_title: Eighth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
